title: I can not connect to the servers. Any ideas why?
body: So it has been six days now since my connection problems happened. Each time i log in i get "Did not recieve a response from the the server; retrying(#)". I have sent Riot 2 emails about this and niether one answered my question of what is wrong here. Masima even posted a connection thread yesterday, February 2nd that explained my problem. But when he posted that it was fixed my server connection was not fixed. I live on the east coast of the US if that means anything(Riot's west coast over east coast preference) If i could have some help that would be great and thanks to any future comments that could help me.

replies.body:
Hello Ima Sour Lemon!

I appreciate you coming to the Help and Support Community regarding this issue!  If you have contacted us here in Player Support already, then it appears that you may have received some basic troubleshooting steps already in hopes of resolving this issue.  Because of that, I went ahead and found the tickets you submitted (I closed all but one to reduce confusion and different answers from different sources), and I am going to respond to it personally.

I look forward to resolving this issue with you!  ^.^
